downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 White Paper: Planning Database Configuration
downloadDescription: The configuration checklist in this document will help you configure the Microsoft Dynamics AX database for optimal performance.

detailsSection: This document provides a checklist for Windows Server and Microsoft SQL Server configuration for optimal performance of the Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 application.
detailsSection_file_name: Planning database configuration for Microsoft Dynamics AX.xps
Planning database configuration for Microsoft Dynamics AX.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • To view the XPS file, you will need Windows Vista or the Microsoft XML Paper Specification Essentials Pack.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file or XPS file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
